response.original_title: Dora the Explorer: Dora and Boots - Best Friends Forever
response.overview: Dora and Boots never explore without each other! Join 8 of their greatest adventrures all about their fantastic friendship! Come along to a magical rainforest amusement park! Help them get together for Best Friends Day! See how they first met! Help Dora take Boots on a special day planned just for him. Plus more, all in this fantastic collection of best friend adventures!
response.title: Dora the Explorer: Dora and Boots - Best Friends Forever
